title: Funerary Figurine of Nesi-ta-neb-ishru
description:
Bright blue faience Ushabti of Nesi-ta-neb-Ishru daughter of Pinezem II. Eight columns of painted inscription around lower part of body; painted flail grasped in each hand.
Condition: Numerous defects in firing; glaze worn in spots on front of body; considerable incrustation. Inscription faint and difficult to read.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
